title: Polygon sync stuck
body:
Hi teams,

Thanks for your great work, I have run ETH and BSC nodes using erigon and they are both working fine.

But I have a problem when running Polygon, is this normal and how should I deal with it?

Description: I started off by downloading the snapshot and running erigon on another machine, but since it was so slow (that machine was using ebs from aws), I just copied the erigon file to a new machine (nvme ssd) and Try to start syncing. After I ran and waited a day, it was still stuck at [5/16 Bodies] Processing bodies, [txpool] stat                            block=37591183.

I also tried unwind, but not much changes.



(I have several restart records in the log)

```
[INFO] [01-07|08:17:16.557] [Snapshots] Blocks Stat                  blocks=36700k indices=36700k alloc=2.9GB sys=3.1GB
```

> Hey @harveyff how did you solve this issue? I am facing similar issue with my polygon erigon node client. I used the official archive dump to spin up the node.


integration state_stages --unwind=10 
integration stage_headers --unwind=10
